mapper.insert: insert into ask (ask_id, class_id, ask_user_id, ask_title, ask_img, ask_vedio, ctime, `status`, `label`, ask_content) values (#{askId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{askUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{askTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{askImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{askVedio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{askContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ask set class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ask_user_id = #{askUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ask_title = #{askTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask_img = #{askImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask_vedio = #{askVedio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask_content = #{askContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ask_id = #{askId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ask_id, class_id, ask_user_id, ask_title, ask_img, ask_vedio, ctime, `status`, `label`, ask_content from ask where ask_id = #{askId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
